Ninja.Description: A rogue archetype that uses ki-fuelled (ninja) tricks that focus on martial arts, misdirection, mental manipulation and assassination.

FxTester.Description: This is a collection of spells that merely generate visual effects.

ObscuringMist.Description: A misty vapor arises around you. It is stationary. The vapor obscures all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet. A creature 5 feet away has concealment (attacks have a 20% miss chance). Creatures farther away have total concealment (50% miss chance, and the attacker cannot use sight to locate the target)..
